Seattle north=Vancouver east=SanFrancisco
Vancouver south=Seattle east=Portland
Portland west=Vancouver south=SanFrancisco east=Boise
SanFrancisco north=Portland east=LosAngeles south=SanDiego west=Seattle
Boise west=Portland east=SaltLakeCity south=Denver
SaltLakeCity west=Boise south=LasVegas
Denver north=Boise south=Dallas
LasVegas north=SaltLakeCity south=Phoenix
LosAngeles west=SanFrancisco
SanDiego north=SanFrancisco
Phoenix north=LasVegas south=Houston
Dallas north=Denver
Houston north=Phoenix east=Atlanta south=Miami
Atlanta west=Houston
Miami north=Houston
